name: Prison (Beroshi Studios)
description:
You're in prison. And you have been for longer than you can remember. Is there a way out of this hell? And why does everything seem so confusing? Your memory is not what it was.

Make your way out of prison in this short, psychological thriller of a text adventure, with four endings.

All thoughts, comments, and feedback are welcome! Thank you for playing.

Thanks: Prison was one of the first games I made out of the wonderful Unity course on Udemy, taught by the glorious Ben Tristem and Brice Fernandes.
